matches./tmp/vanessa/spack-stage/spack-stage-py-:
easyblock = 'ConfigureMake'

name = 'OpenMPI'
version = '2.1.2'

homepage = 'http://www.open-mpi.org/'
description = """The Open MPI Project is an open source MPI-2 implementation."""

toolchain = {'name': 'GCC', 'version': '4.6.4'}

sources = [SOURCELOWER_TAR_GZ]
source_urls = ['http://www.open-mpi.org/software/ompi/v%(version_major_minor)s/downloads']

dependencies = [('hwloc', '1.11.8')]

configopts = '--with-threads=posix --enable-shared --enable-mpi-thread-multiple --with-openib '
configopts += '--enable-mpirun-prefix-by-default '  # suppress failure modes in relation to mpirun path
configopts += '--with-hwloc=$EBROOTHWLOC '  # hwloc support
configopts += '--disable-dlopen '  # statically link component, don't do dynamic loading

# needed for --with-openib
if OS_NAME in ['debian', 'ubuntu']:
    osdependencies = ['libibverbs-dev']
else:
    # OK for OS_NAME == redhat, fedora, RHEL, SL, centos
    osdependencies = ['libibverbs-devel']

sanity_check_paths = {
    'files': ["bin/%s" % f for f in ["ompi_info", "opal_wrapper", "orterun"]] +
             ["lib/lib%s.%s" % (l, SHLIB_EXT) for l in ["mpi_cxx", "mpi_f77", "mpi_f90",
                                                        "mpi", "ompitrace", "open-pal",
                                                        "open-rte", "vt", "vt-hyb",
                                                        "vt-mpi", "vt-mpi-unify"]] +
             ["include/%s.h" % x for x in ["mpi-ext", "mpif-common", "mpif-config", "mpif",
                                           "mpif-mpi-io", "mpi", "mpi_portable_platform"]],
    'dirs': ["include/openmpi/ompi/mpi/cxx"],
}

moduleclass = 'mpi'

easyblock = 'ConfigureMake'

name = 'OpenMPI'
version = '2.1.2'

homepage = 'http://www.open-mpi.org/'
description = """The Open MPI Project is an open source MPI-2 implementation."""

sources = [SOURCELOWER_TAR_GZ]
source_urls = ['http://www.open-mpi.org/software/ompi/v%(version_major_minor)s/downloads']

dependencies = [('hwloc', '1.11.8')]

configopts += '--enable-mpirun-prefix-by-default '  # suppress failure modes in relation to mpirun path
configopts += '--with-hwloc=$EBROOTHWLOC '  # hwloc support
configopts += '--disable-dlopen '  # statically link component, don't do dynamic loading

# needed for --with-openib
if OS_NAME in ['debian', 'ubuntu']:
    osdependencies = ['libibverbs-dev']
else:
    # OK for OS_NAME == redhat, fedora, RHEL, SL, centos
    osdependencies = ['libibverbs-devel']

sanity_check_paths = {
    'files': ["bin/%s" % f for f in ["ompi_info", "opal_wrapper", "orterun"]] +
             ["lib/lib%s.%s" % (l, SHLIB_EXT) for l in ["mpi_cxx", "mpi_f77", "mpi_f90",
                                                        "mpi", "ompitrace", "open-pal",
                                                        "open-rte", "vt", "vt-hyb",
                                                        "vt-mpi", "vt-mpi-unify"]] +

    'dirs': ["include/openmpi/ompi/mpi/cxx"],

moduleclass = 'mpi'

easyblock = 'ConfigureMake'

name = 'OpenMPI'
version = "2.1.2"

homepage = 'http://www.open-mpi.org/'
description = """The Open MPI Project is an open source MPI-2 implementation."""

toolchain = {'name': 'gcccuda', 'version': '2018a'}

sources = [SOURCELOWER_TAR_GZ]
source_urls = ['http://www.open-mpi.org/software/ompi/v%(version_major_minor)s/downloads']

patches = [
    'OpenMPI-%(version)s_common-cuda-lib.patch',
    'OpenMPI-%(version)s-vt_cupti_events.patch',
]

dependencies = [('hwloc', '1.11.8')]

configopts = '--with-threads=posix --enable-shared --enable-mpi-thread-multiple --with-verbs '
configopts += '--enable-mpirun-prefix-by-default '  # suppress failure modes in relation to mpirun path
configopts += '--with-hwloc=$EBROOTHWLOC '  # hwloc support
configopts += '--with-cuda=$CUDA_HOME '             # CUDA-aware build; N.B. --disable-dlopen is incompatible

# needed for --with-verbs
osdependencies = [('libibverbs-dev', 'libibverbs-devel')]

local_libs = ["mpi_cxx", "mpi_mpifh", "mpi", "ompitrace", "open-pal", "open-rte", "vt", "vt-hyb", "vt-mpi", "vt-mpi-unify"]
sanity_check_paths = {
    'files': ["bin/%s" % f for f in ["ompi_info", "opal_wrapper", "orterun"]] +
             ["lib/lib%s.%s" % (l, SHLIB_EXT) for l in local_libs] +
             ["include/%s.h" % x for x in ["mpi-ext", "mpif-config", "mpif", "mpi", "mpi_portable_platform"]],
    'dirs': ["include/openmpi/ompi/mpi/cxx"],
}

moduleclass = 'mpi'
